T04D3871:39a-15: dpag bsam shing gi skyed mos tshal //
T04D3871:39a-16: sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas sras //
T04D3871:39a-17: chos snyan sgrogs pas gang ba yis //
T04D3871:39a-18: phyogs rnams thams cad gang bar shog / thams cad
T04D3871:39a-19: du yang sa gzhi dag / gseg ma la sogs
T04D3871:39a-20: med pa dang // lag mthil mnyam pa bee d'urya'i //
T04D3871:39a-21: rang bzhin 'jam por gnas par gyur //
T04D3871:39a-23: byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag / rang gi
T04D3871:39a-24: legs pas sa stengs dag / brgyan par mdzad pas
T04D3871:39a-25: bzhugs gyur cig / lus can kun gyis bye dang
T04D3871:39a-26: ni // shing dang 'od zer thams cad dang //
T04D3871:39a-27: nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra //
T04D3871:39a-28: rgyun mi 'chad par thos par shog / de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang //
T04D3871:39a-29: sangs rgyas sras dang phrad gyur cig / mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas //
T04D3871:39a-30: 'gro ba'i bla ma mchod par shog / lha yang dus su char 'bebs shing //
T04D3871:39a-31: lo tog phun sum tshogs par shog / rgyal po chos bzhin byed gyur cig /
T04D3871:39b-0: @39b 'jig rten dag kyang dar bar shog / sman rnams mthu dang ldan pa dang //
T04D3871:39b-1: gsang sngags bzlas brjod grub par shog / mkha' 'gro srin po la sogs pa //
T04D3871:39b-2: snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur cig / sems can 'ga' yang sdug ma gyur //
T04D3871:39b-4: 'ga' yang yid mi bde ma gyur //
T04D3871:39b-5: gtsug lag khang rnams klog pa dang //
T04D3871:39b-6: kha thon gyis brgyan legs gnas shog / rtag tu dge 'dun mthun pa dang //
T04D3871:39b-7: dge 'dun don yang grub par shog / bslab pa
T04D3871:39b-8: 'dod pa'i dge slong dag / dben pa dag kyang
T04D3871:39b-9: thob par shog / g-yeng ba thams cad spangs nas
T04D3871:39b-10: ni // sems ni las rung sgom gyur cig / dge slong ma rnams rnyed ldan zhing //
T04D3871:39b-11: 'thab dang gnod pa spang bar shog / de bzhin rab tu byung ba kun //
T04D3871:39b-12: tshul khrims nyams pa med gyur cig / tshul khrims 'chal pas yid byung nas //
T04D3871:39b-13: rtag tu sdig pa zad byed shog / bde 'gro dag kyang thob gyur nas //
T04D3871:39b-14: der yang brtul zhugs mi nyams shog / mkhas pa rnams ni bkur ba dang //
T04D3871:39b-15: bsod snyoms dag kyang rnyed par shog / rgyud ni yongs su dag pa dang //
T04D3871:39b-16: phyogs rnams kun tu grags par shog / ngan song sdug bsngal ma myong zhing //
T04D3871:39b-17: dka' ba spyad pa med par yang //
T04D3871:39b-18: lha bas lhag pa'i lus kyis ni //
T04D3871:39b-19: de dag sangs rgyas myur 'grub shog / sems can kun gyis lan mang du //
T04D3871:39b-20: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byed cing //
T04D3871:39b-21: sangs rgyas bde ba bsam yas kyis //
T04D3871:39b-22: rtag tu bde dang ldan gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni //
T04D3871:39b-23: 'gro don thugs la dgongs 'grub shog / mgon po yis ni gang dgongs pa //
T04D3871:39b-24: sems can rnams la de 'byor shog / de bzhin rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
T04D3871:39b-25: nyan thos rnams kyang bde gyur cig / bdag kyang 'jam dbyangs bka' drin gyis //
T04D3871:39b-26: sa rab dga' ba thob par du //
T04D3871:39b-27: rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang //
T04D3871:40a-1: thob par shog / bdag ni kha zas kyi nas kyang //
T04D3871:40a-2: nyams dang ldan zhing 'tsho bar shog / tshe rabs kun du dben gnas par //
T04D3871:40a-3: phun sum ldan pa thob par shog / gang tshe blta bar 'dod pa'am //
T04D3871:40a-4: cung zad dri bar 'dod na yang //
T04D3871:40a-5: mgon po 'jam dbyangs de nyid ni //
T04D3871:40a-6: gegs med par yang mthong bar shog / phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i //
T04D3871:40a-7: sems can kun don bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04D3871:40a-8: ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyod mdzad pa //
T04D3871:40a-9: bdag gi spyod pa'ang de 'drar shog / ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa dang //
T04D3871:40a-10: 'gro ba ji srid gnas gyur pa //
T04D3871:40a-11: de srid bdag ni gnas gyur nas //
T04D3871:40a-12: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar shog /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gang ci'ang rung //
T04D3871:40a-13: de kun bdag la smin gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis //
T04D3871:40a-14: 'gro ba bde la spyod par shog /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sman gcig pu //
T04D3871:40a-15: bde ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T04D3871:40a-16: bstan pa rnyed dang bkur sti dang //
T04D3871:40a-17: bcas te yun ring gnas gyur cig / gang gi drin gyis dge blo 'byung //
T04D3871:40a-19: gang gi drin gyis bdag dar ba //
T04D3871:40a-20: dge ba'i bshes la'ang bdag phyag 'tshal //
T04D3871:40a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las bsngo ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa'o /
T04D3871:40a-23: // / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa slob dpon shanta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04D3871:40a-25: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dzny'a de ba dang /
T04D3871:40a-26: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis
T04D3871:40a-27: kha che'i dpe las zhus te gtan la phab pa
T04D3871:40a-28: las / slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
T04D3871:40a-29: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rin chen bzang po dang /
T04D3871:40a-30: sh'akya blo gros kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang 'grel
T04D3871:40a-31: pa dang mthun par bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la
T04D3871:40a-32: phab pa'o // yang dus phyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti k'irti dang /
T04D3871:40a-33: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan
T04D3871:40a-34: shes rab kyis dag par bcos shing bsgyur te legs
